ygData.subject: Re: Gelatenous cube in running eye?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have always been able to find the Cube by following the waterway to the other end where it opens into a large pool... there is  an underwater tunnel at the
ygData.messageBody:
I have always been able to find the Cube by following the waterway to the
other end where it opens into a large pool...
there is an underwater tunnel at the end of the pool, swim in there, the
cube is always there... after starting the attack swim out and jump out the
pool, the cube will follow you and you can attack him there....
caution you might also pull some Gobbie that lives down there as well... I
just ignored him till I killed the Cube

----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Darder <LordTwinkie@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 25, 2000 10:57 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Gelatenous cube in running eye?


> From: "Chris Darder" <LordTwinkie@...>
>
> Okay the cube is nowhere near there but on the same lvl
> okay you rember how you come down the ramp go through that first door then
> the second door
> then theres the guards you go around them to head to kings room well this
> time
> you don't go into that next door but take a right and you will see water
and
> path following the way on both sides
> you follow the path by taking a left and you go all the way till you come
to
> some tables and such and you will see a star with
> water in it and water around it you have to jump into the star and swim
down
> sometimes theres some kind of water goblin i forget
> the name of it down there wasn't too much trouble for me lvl 30 monk
> took me over 15 hours yesterday camping to finally get the goblin in
> beholder luckly the one in misty spawned within an hour
> good luck
>
> Darder Brainsmasher
> Lvl30 Monk Quellious server

have

> > Running Eye.
> >
> > I am trying to find the exact location of the gelatenous cube in running
> > eye. If anyone here has any ideas as to whre it is (in relation to the
> > throne room an the captain spawn) please provide DETAILED explanation.
> > Everyone tells me behind the throne room but I just spent all night

> kill

> >
> > Ok so as I enter the King I face a door that leeads to the room where
the
> > captain spawns ( one of the elite guards is the captains place holder)
> Now
> > does the cube spawn in this "captain room" or in the hall behind the
door
> > in the back of this "captain room"? Or is he even farther back?
> >
> > If I am rambling excuse me but I just spent allnight on this damned
quest
> > with no results... very frustrating....
> >
